description:
While Playstation has mainly approached each console generation with an, “if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it,” attitude, each new addition has brought new features; some welcome additions, and some others that are… not so welcome. So, let’s take a look at some of the different PlayStation consoles, and highlight the best, and worst, of what they had to offer.

Timestamps:
00:43 - Blu-ray on PlayStation 3
02:10 - Sixaxis controller
04:50 - DualSense haptics 
05:26 - DualSense mic
06:33 - Share button
07:48 - Vita rear touch

#gaming #PlayStation #gamespot
title: The Best And Worst Features Of PlayStation Consoles
